original: 上古神廚易牙，取傳說中妖鳥羅羅之足，經七七四十九日精煉熟成，食缺頃刻復生。或可邊打邊食，充補體力，誘人香氣同時引發敵人飢餓感。
text: The ancient divine kitchen Yifang, took the feet of the legendary demon bird Luo Luo, refined and matured after seven or forty-nine days, and immediately revived from the lack of food. Or you can eat while playing to replenish your energy, and the enticing aroma will also trigger the enemy's hunger.
